lesson: Talking about Technology and Its Impact

words.definition: The use of scientific knowledge for practical purposes.
A machine or tool made for a specific purpose.
words.arabic_definition: آلة أو أداة مصنوعة لغرض معين.

example.en: I use my phone as a device for communication.
Technology has a positive impact on education.
The internet allows us to communicate easily.

words.definition: Technology that can perform tasks usually done by humans.
words.arabic_definition: تكنولوجيا تقوم بمهام عادةً يقوم بها البشر.

words.definition: The right to keep personal information secret.
words.arabic_definition: الحق في الحفاظ على المعلومات الشخصية سرية.

example.en: Privacy is important when using technology.

words.definition: Protecting computers and data from attacks.

example.ar: يساعد الأمن السيبراني في حماية المعلومات الحساسة.

words.definition: A mobile phone with advanced features.
words.arabic_definition: هاتف محمول يحتوي على ميزات متقدمة.

example.en: Most people own a smartphone nowadays.
example.ar: يمتلك معظم الناس هاتفًا ذكيًا هذه الأيام.

words.definition: Programs used by a computer or device.

example.en: The software needs to be updated regularly.
